content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 19}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 58, "index": 35}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 39}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a birch_pressure_plate, I need to craft birch_planks first. To craft birch_planks, I need to place a birch_log in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the birch_log from slot 23 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 19}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 58, "index": 35}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 39}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the birch_planks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 19}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 58, "index": 35}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 39}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have the birch_planks, I need to place them in the crafting grid. I will move the birch_planks from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 19}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 58, "index": 35}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 39}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}]

thought: Since the birch_planks have been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the second birch_planks to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the birch_planks to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 17, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 19}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 58, "index": 35}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 39}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the birch_pressure_plate by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
